snippet: The city developed an overhauled plan that would move more events to other parts of Massachusetts, and maybe beyond.
abstract: Revised Olympic bid by group Boston 2024 has events spread all across Massachusetts rather than clustered in city as first promised.
lead_paragraph: The city developed an overhauled plan that would move more events to other parts of Massachusetts, and maybe beyond.

headline.main: Boston Revises Bid in Effort to Host 2024 Olympics
headline.print_headline: Boston Group Revises Its Bid to Host 2024 Games
